title: DragonWorld
description: This is the first book of Brok’s adventures. It tells of his hatching at the same time as the royal queen’s egg, his growing up to become a sentinel dragon, and his forbidden chance meeting with Tula. The two of them are whirled out of Dragon World and into an adventure that leads to new family. The meeting with the Ancient Dragons of Yonda and onto life changing experiences.
author: Jane Elisabeth Tilbury
